indicator_name: 사계절 도로 2km 반경 내 거주하는 시골 인구 비율
target_name: 경제발전 및 인간의 웰빙을 위한 고품질, 신뢰성 높은, 지속가능한 탄력적 기반 시설 구축

en.target: Develop quality, reliable, sustainable and resilient infrastructure, including regional and trans-border infrastructure, to support economic development and human well-being, with a focus on affordable and equitable access for all

en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
